name: Care Less, Get More
description:
Care Less, Get More is a game made for Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3. It's a game where you have to complete each level with the lowest possible score.
  • Use WASD or Arrow keys to move.
  • Press Escape to open pause menu.
  • Avoid coins to lower your score.
  • Bump into spikes to lose health.
